import React from 'react' function OrderItem({order, token, getter, updater}) { const {id, name, count, complete} = order; const key = id + 'OrderItem'; const isCompleted = (complete === 1); const inverseCompleted = (isCompleted) ? 0 : 1; return (
  • {id}. {name}
    {count} Product{(count === 1)?'s':''}
    {(isCompleted)?'':'Not'} Complete
    updater(token(), id, inverseCompleted)} className='fa fa-info-circle text-success hover-spin'> getter(token(), id)} className='fa fa-info-circle text-success hover-spin'>
    • ) } export default OrderItem
